title: World Series: These Are Still Jeff Luhnow’s Astros
description: Jeff Luhnow was fired over Houston’s elaborate sign-stealing scheme. He takes responsibility but not blame and has moved on to building soccer teams.
dc:creator: Tyler Kepner
media:description: Jeff Luhnow and the Houston Astros were the talk of baseball after they went through an aggressive rebuild and then beat the Los Angeles Dodgers in the World Series.
